attributes.action: Make all London toilets free to the public.
attributes.background:
Tell me,
If  places such as Devon and remote parts of our beautiful country can supply FREE public toilets. WHY CANT LONDON.
In one of the greatest and most expensive citys, its a disgrace.

NO EXCUSES MR SADIQ KHAN, CHANGE IT PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

rejection.details: Public toilets in London are the responsibility of local councils and other operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.
